alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 9:53AM CST until January 27 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Lake Creek at Sendera Ranch Road affecting Montgomery County. For the West Fork San Jacinto River...including Porter, Sendera Ranch Road, Conroe, Humble, Sheldon...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lake Creek at Sendera Ranch Road. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Saturday the stage was 138.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 129.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM CST Saturday was 140.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 126.5 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 138.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 138.1 feet on 12/06/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (10 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Lake Creek Sendera Ranch Roa 138.0 138.1 Sat 8 am CST 135.7 133.2 130.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this eveningthis evening at 1000 PM CST.
